# Apryse documentation

World's #1 PDF SDK Library for Web, Server, Desktop, Mobile

## Getting Started
- [Quick Start](https://docs.apryse.com/guides/get-started): A guide to help you quickly select your langauge, platform, framework for tailored instructions to set up and start using the Apryse PDF SDK.
- [Samples](https://docs.apryse.com/samples): A collection of sample projects demonstrating various features of the Apryse SDK.
- [Downloads](https://docs.apryse.com/downloads): Choose product to access correct download for the Apryse SDK and related resources.
- [APIs](https://docs.apryse.com/apis): Links for each product/language to access comprehensive API documentation for the Apryse SDK.

## Platform-Specific Documentation
### WebViewer, JavaScript and Web Frameworks
- [Guides for JavaScript PDF Viewer Library - WebViewer](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides): Documentation for implementing the PDF viewer in JavaScript applications.
- [Web Get Started](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started): Choose best framework for detailed implemention instructions for adding the PDF SDK into web applications.
- [WebViewer Free Trial Key](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started/trial-key): Generate trial key for free trial of WebViewer. 
- [React](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started/react): Integration guide for using the Apryse Web SDK with React applications.
- [Angular](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started/angular): Instructions for integrating the Web SDK with Angular frameworks.
- [Vue](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started/vue): Guidelines for using the Apryse Web SDK in Vue.js applications.
- [Next.js](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started/nextjs): Documentation for Next.js integration with the Apryse Web SDK.

### Mobile SDK
- [Guides for iOS PDF Library](https://docs.apryse.com/ios/guides): Specific instructions for using the PDF library on iOS.
- [Android PDF Manipulation Library](https://docs.apryse.com/android/guides/manipulation): Guidelines for manipulating PDFs on Android devices.
- [React Native](https://docs.apryse.com/android/guides/get-started/react-native): Instructions for using the Apryse Mobile SDK in React Native applications.
- [Flutter](https://docs.apryse.com/android/guides/get-started/flutter): Guidelines for integrating the Apryse Mobile SDK with Flutter applications.
- [Xamarin](https://docs.apryse.com/Xamarin/guides): Guidelines for integrating the Apryse Mobile SDK with Xamarin applications.

### Desktop and Server SDK
- [Cross-Platform Server/Desktop PDF Library - Documentation](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides): Overview of the Apryse Server SDK's capabilities across desktop and server environments.
- [Server SDK Get Started](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started): Choose best language, platform for detailed implemention instructions for adding the PDF SDK into server or desktop applications.
- [Server SDK Free Trial Key](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/get-started/trial-key): Generate trial key for free trial of Server SDK. 
- [PDF Command-line Library](https://docs.apryse.com/cli/guides): Instructions for using the command-line interface for PDF, document operations.
- [.NET (C#, VB)](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/get-started/dotnet): Documentation for using the Apryse SDK with .NET applications.
- [C++](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/get-started/cpp): Guidelines for integrating the SDK with C++ applications.
- [Python](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/get-started/python): Guidelines for integrating the SDK with Python applications.
- [PHP](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/get-started/php): Guidelines for integrating the SDK with PHP applications.
- [Java](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/get-started/python): Guidelines for integrating the SDK with Java applications.

## Integrations
- [Salesforce](https://docs.apryse.com/salesforce/guides): Integration guidelines for Salesforce applications.
- [Appian](https://docs.apryse.com/appian/guides): Documentation for using the SDK with Appian.
- [SharePoint](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/sharepoint): Guidelines for integrating the SDK with SharePoint.
- [OutSystems](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started/outsystems): Instructions for using the SDK with OutSystems.
- [Microsoft Teams](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/get-started/microsoft-teams): Integration documentation for Microsoft Teams.
- [Mendix](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/mendix): Guidelines for using the SDK with Mendix applications.

## Sample Code and Demos
- [Apryse Web Samples: View, Annotate, Edit & More](https://docs.apryse.com/web/samples): A collection of samples showcasing various functionalities of the Web SDK.
- [Apryse Server Samples: View, Annotate, Edit & More](https://docs.apryse.com/core/samples): A collection of samples showcasing various functionalities of the Server SDK.
- [Digitally Sign PDF Files](https://docs.apryse.com/core/samples/digitalsignaturestest): Sample code in several languages for digitally signing PDFs using Server SDK.
- [Convert Files](https://docs.apryse.com/core/samples/converttest): Sample to convert file types with Apryse Server SDK.
- [HTML to PDF conversion](https://docs.apryse.com/core/samples/html2pdftest): Sample code for converting HTML to PDF in Server SDK.
- [OCR - search and extract](https://docs.apryse.com/core/samples/ocrtest): Sample code to apply Apyrse Server OCR module on scanned documents.
- [Add or Edit PDF Annotations](https://docs.apryse.com/web/samples/annotationtest): Guidelines for managing PDF annotations in Web SDK.
- [Viewing Documents with Web SDK](https://docs.apryse.com/web/samples/viewing): Javascript sample code to view documents with WebViewer.

## FAQs and Support
- [FAQ - Web SDK](https://docs.apryse.com/web/faq): Frequently asked questions regarding Apryse WebViewer.
- [FAQ - Server SDK](https://docs.apryse.com/core/faq): Frequently asked questions regarding the Apryse Server SDK.
- [Contact sales](https://apryse.com/form/contact-sales?docLink=llms): Information on how to contact the sales team for inquiries.
- [Raise a ticket](https://support.apryse.com/?docLink=llms): Submit a support ticket for technical issues.

## Additional Resources
- [Extraction Docs](https://docs.apryse.com/templateextraction/guides/features): Guidelines for data extraction capabilities of the SDK.
- [OCR Docs](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/ocr): Documentation on Optical Character Recognition features.
- [DOCX Guides](https://docs.apryse.com/web/guides/office/edit-docx-file): Instructions for working with DOCX files in conjunction with the SDK.
- [DOCX Demo](https://apryse.com/blog/webviewer/how-to-embed-docx-editing-in-javascript): A demonstration of DOCX functionalities within the SDK.
- [Smart Data Exraction Guide](https://docs.apryse.com/core/guides/rag-guide): Instructions for setting up the SDK in various Integrated Development Environments (IDEs).
- [Fluent Docs](https://fluent.apryse.com/documentation): Documentation for Fluent, document automation tool.
- [iText Knowledge Base](https://kb.itextpdf.com/): Documentation focused on iText, server-side PDF processing with open source options.

This structured summary provides a comprehensive overview of the Apryse documentation, ensuring that all relevant links and descriptions are included for easy reference.
